summary: WHILE DRIVING ON INTERSTATE FRONT WHEELS BEGAN SHAKING.  SHAKING STOPPED BELOW 30 MPH BUT STEERING BECAME DIFFICULT TO TURN.  FOR PAST COUPLE OF WEEKS I EXPERIENCED SENSATION THAT CAR WAS NOT CONNECTED TO ROAD AS IF THE FRONT WHEELS WERE NOT TURNING WHEN STEERING WHEEL WAS TURNED.  CONVINCED MYSELF IT WAS IRREGULARITIES IN ROAD AND CONTINUED ON.  TODAY LIMPED HOME AT 30MPH.
